From 1977 to 2011, Walter Krone was the Managing Director of the Krone wholesale that made an outstanding progress under his leadership. It was Walter Krone who implemented the concentration on the exclusive sales of various premium brands. In addition to the Krone brand, this included renowned manufacturers such as John Deere, Lemken, Rauch and Grimme. Thanks to this strategy, the Krone wholesale grew steadily; between 1977 and 2000 Walter Krone achieved that the revenue almost quadrupled.

title: Official handover at Nuremberg harbour
summary: Amm Spedition has ordered more than 150 Krone units in the years 2019 and 2020. The symbolic handover of the 150th vehicle has now taken place on the premises of the forwarding agency at Nuremberg harbour by Krone Regional Sales Manager Johannes Bründl, who thanked the company on behalf of the entire Krone team for the excellent and cooperative collaboration.

title: Lightweight, but super safe
summary: For the new Light Safety Sandwich Floor, Krone has now received the Trailer Innovation 2021 award (category safety). The announcement was made during the virtual commercial vehicle trade fair MFB 2020.

title: Krone und Shippeo starten strategische Partnerschaft
summary:
Krone, einer der größten europäischen Trailerhersteller, hat eine globale strategische Partnerschaft mit Shippeo, dem europäischen Marktführer für Echtzeit-Transporttransparenzlösungen, gestartet, um Krone Telematics Kunden zukünftig mit Echtzeit-Diensten versorgen zu können.

Dank der Zusammenarbeit ist Krone der erste Trailer-Hersteller, der im Rahmen seiner Telematiklösung „Krone Telematics“ ETA-Vorhersagen (Estimated Time of Arrival – dt.: voraussichtliche Ankunftszeit) in Echtzeit bereitstellen kann. Die Kunden erhalten Zugang zu den präzisesten und zuverlässigsten ETA-Vorhersagen für den Logistikbereich auf dem Markt. Diese basieren auf einem von Shippeo entwickelten proprietären und branchenführenden Algorithmus, der auf über 200 Datenparameter zurückgreift. "Es gibt eine wachsende Nachfrage nach Trailern mit eingebauter ETA-Prognosefunktionalität, um Transporte effektiver zu managen", sagt Dr. Stefan Binnewies, COO von Krone, und fügt hinzu: "Trailer von Krone sind auf dem neuesten Stand der Technik. Nun erweitern wir unser Portfolio um weitere erstklassige digitale Services. Unsere Trailer werden für die digitalen Anforderungen der Verlader vorbereitet. Wir wollen weiterhin die führenden Lösungen auf dem Markt anbieten. Die ETA von Shippeo ist die genaueste und zuverlässigste auf dem Markt.”

title: Aloys Schnelte in den Ruhestand verabschiedet
summary: Aloys Schnelte (65), kaufmännischer Geschäftsführer (CFO) der Krone Nutzfahrzeug-Gruppe, wurde jetzt, nach fast 30 überaus erfolgreichen Jahren in der Krone Gruppe, offiziell in den Ruhestand verabschiedet. Der studierte Diplom-Kaufmann ist seit 1991 für Krone tätig; zunächst war er Leiter des Bereichs Controlling in der Maschinenfabrik, ab 1999 weitete sich das Aufgabengebiet auch auf den Krone Nutzfahrzeugbereich aus und er übernahm die Leitung des Controllings der Krone Gruppe. Mit Gründung der neuen Krone Nutzfahrzeug-Gruppe im Jahr 2016 wurde Aloys Schnelte zum geschäftsführenden Direktor ernannt; in dieser Funktion verantwortete er in den vergangenen Jahren den kaufmännischen Bereich und Gesamtpersonal der Nutzfahrzeug-Gruppe.

title: Ein Allrounder in der Schweiz
summary:
Ihren Fuhrpark ergänzten jetzt die Brüder Xavier und Patrick Berthod von der Schweizer Spedition Berthod Transport SA um einen Krone Profi Liner. Überzeugt hat die Brüder insbesondere die Flexibilität des Aufliegers, das als echtes Allroundtalent für verschiedenste Einsatzzwecke genutzt werden kann.

„Damit entspricht das Fahrzeug genau unseren Ansprüchen, denn wir wollen unsere Kunden immer zufrieden stellen. Das heißt, wir setzen alles daran, Aufträge in bestmöglicher Weise zu bearbeiten und auszuführen und alle Herausforderungen in Bezug auf Termindruck und Frachtraum zu meistern. Deshalb haben wir uns für einen Profi Liner mit Hubdach-Ausrüstung entschieden. Mit diesem Trailer können wir eine Vielzahl unserer Transportaufgaben hervorragend bewältigen“, so Xavier und Patrick Berthod.

title: Krone Trailer „Beste Marke“ bei großer Leserwahl
summary: Wieder an der Spitze: Bei der großen Leserwahl der Zeitungen trans aktuell, lastauto omnibus und Fernfahrer belegt Krone – wie auch schon im Vorjahr – den Spitzenplatz in der Kategorie „Trailer Plane/Curtainsider“. Fast 50 Prozent der insgesamt 8.125 Teilnehmer wählten Krone auf Platz 1. Ebenso erfreulich: Mehr als 43 Prozent der Teilnehmer vergaben ihre Stimme auch an Krone in der Kategorie „Trailer Koffer-/Kühlaufbauten“; damit belegt Krone einen souveränen 2. Rang. Und nicht zuletzt konnte auch die Krone Achse bei Deutschlands größter Nutzfahrzeug-Leserwahl überzeugen; hier belegt Krone Platz 3.

title: Mehr Nutzlast dank 4. Achse
summary: Der erste Krone Profi Liner mit vier Achsen ist jetzt auf den Straßen Dänemarks unterwegs. Das neue Fahrzeug erhielt vor wenigen Tagen die Zulassung durch die dänischen Behörden. Damit bietet Krone jetzt ein Fahrzeug an, das speziell auf die Anforderungen dänischer Transportunternehmen zugeschnitten wurde. Denn in Dänemark darf ein Sattelzug mit insgesamt sieben Achsen ein Gesamtgewicht von 56 Tonnen haben. Der Profi Liner mit vier Achsen darf ein Gesamtgewicht von 30 Tonnen aufweisen; jede Achse trägt hier 7,5 Tonnen. Dagegen darf ein baugleicher, beladener Auflieger mit drei Achsen in Dänemark maximal 24 Tonnen wiegen.

title: Brit-Pol wächst weiter
summary: Das britische Transportunternehmen Brit-Pol erweitert seinen Fuhrpark aktuell um 156 Krone Einheiten, die bis Mitte Juli sukzessiv geliefert werden. Damit will das Familienunternehmen weitere Transportaufgaben in den Benelux-Ländern und Europa realisieren. Das vor rund zehn Jahren gegründete, schnell expandierende Unternehmen liefert Autoteile und Stückgut innerhalb Großbritanniens und den Benelux-Ländern. Jetzt, sagt Adam Zegocki, Director Operations, soll mit den neuen Fahrzeugen, schnell ein europaweiter Transport aufgebaut werden. „Flexibilität ist der Schlüssel zu unserem Wachstumsplan“, erklärt er. „Durch die Spezifikation der neuen Krone Fahrzeuge können wir unsere Ladekapazitäten für ein breiteres Kundenspektrum aufstellen. Zum Beispiel sind die Box Liner-Containerchassis für den Transport von 20-, 30-, 40- und 45-Zoll-Containern, zwei Boxen gleichzeitig oder einen Container in Standardgröße ausgelegt. In Kombination mit den Twist Lock-Schnellverschlüssen können wir die Container schnell und einfach umschlagen.“

title: Neue Sanitärcontainer im GVZ Bremen
summary:
Letzte Woche wurden im Servicepark des GVZ Bremen neue Sanitärcontainer mit Dusch- und WC-Anlagen für LKW-Fahrer/Innen in Betrieb genommen. Die Container, die sich auf dem Gelände des zentralen GVZ-Gastronomiebetriebs und Betreiber, Das Backhaus, befinden, stehen ab sofort allen LKW-Fahrer/Innen zur kostenlosen Nutzung zur Verfügung.

Die Anschaffung der Container wurde über die Initiative #Logistikhilft in Zusammenarbeit mit der GVZ Entwicklungsgesellschaft Bremen und das Backhaus umgesetzt. Weitere Unterstützer sind die Straßenverkehrsgenossenschaft Bremen, der Landesverband Verkehrsgewerbe Bremen sowie die Stadt Bremen. Bei der Inbetriebnahme war auch Krone Geschäftsführer Dr. Frank Albers vor Ort. „Krone unterstützt schon seit Jahrzehnten zahlreiche Projekte, die den Alltag von LKW-Fahrern erleichtern, deshalb waren wir auch als einer der ersten Unterstützer bei dieser tollen Initiative dabei. Nicht erst seit Ausbruch der Corona-Pandemie zeigt sich in aller Deutlichkeit, dass die Grundversorgung der Bevölkerung ohne die Transportwirtschaft nicht funktioniert. Deshalb tragen wir gerne unseren Teil dazu bei, den Alltag von Fahrern zu verbessern. Und dass die Sanitärcontainer im ältesten deutschen GVZ Bremen, übrigens auch die Nr. 1 in Europa, gut positioniert sind, versteht sich von selbst.“

title: FreshLinc nutzt Kinderzeichnung für Auflieger-Optik
summary: FreshLinc, ein führender englischer Logistik-Dienstleister, hat seine Flotte um 120 neue Krone Cool Liner erweitert, von denen einer mit einer ganz besonderen Optik heraussticht. Das farbenfrohe Design kombiniert handgemalte Bilder eines Lastwagens, eines Busses und des mittlerweile bekannten Regenbogensymbols und bedankt sich bei „Unseren Transportarbeitern“ und beim National Health Service (NHS, Nationaler Gesundheitsdienst) für die Unterstützung in der Covid-19-Situation. Bei der Gestaltung des Aufliegers hat FreshLinc auf eine Zeichnung der 6-jährigen Olivia Chatterley zurückgegriffen, sie ist die Tochter eines FreshLinc Zulieferes.

title: Krone unterstützt Charity-Radtour mit 10.000 Euro
summary:
Einen Spendenscheck der Dr. Bernard Krone Stiftung in Höhe von 10.000 Euro überreichte heute Bernard Krone an Ludger Abeln, NDR-Moderator und Initiator der Caritas-Charity Radtour „Zeit zu helfen - 1000 km gegen Corona“. Mit dem Geld wird die Caritas (Diözese Osnabrück) insbesondere Menschen unterstützen, deren Existenzen in vielfältiger Weise durch die Corona-Pandemie gefährdet sind, wie z.B. Familien mit Kindern und kleinem Einkommen, Wohnungslose, Alleinerziehende, Rentner mit kleinem Budget sowie Menschen, die von Kurzarbeit oder Arbeitslosigkeit aufgrund der Epidemie betroffen sind.

„Es ist ebenso schön wie bemerkenswert, dass es Menschen wie Sie gibt, die Ihre Ideen in Taten umsetzen und mit Ihrem sozialen Engagement dazu beitragen, Hilfsbedürftige zu unterstützen und somit auch gleichzeitig ein Stück weit Hoffnung schenken. Dieses Engagement unterstützen wir sehr gerne.“ – mit diesen Worten begrüße Bernard Krone Ludger Abeln am Krone Standort in Spelle.

title: Drent Transport mit neuem Krone Lang-Lkw
summary:
Das internationale Transport- und Umzugsunternehmen Drent aus Ureterp im niederländischen Friesland setzt seit einigen Monaten einen Lang-Lkw für Transporte von und nach Skandinavien ein. Damit reagiert Drent Transport in erster Linie auf das erhöhte Transportvolumen, denn mit dem Lang-Lkw können mehrere Frachten effizient kombiniert werden. Sowohl der Dolly als auch der Auflieger wurden von Krone geliefert.

„Wir sind auf Umzüge nach und von Skandinavien spezialisiert, das ist ein Nischenmarkt. Oft fahren wir ‚Full Truck Load‘ also komplette Frachten, aber manchmal sind auch kleinere Chargen dabei, die wir bei Hin- oder Rücktransporten kombinieren können. Deshalb arbeiten wir eng mit anderen Umzugsspezialisten zusammen, die nicht selber nach Skandinavien fahren", so Eigentümer Willem Drent. Er gründete das Unternehmen gemeinsam mit seinem Partner Djoeke de Vegt in 2007; seitdem ist die Fahrzeug-Flotte kontinuierlich auf die derzeitige Größe von fünf Kombinationen gewachsen.

title: Krone unterstützt Brancheninitiative #Logistikhilft
summary: Krone ist einer der ersten Unterstützer und Spender der neu gegründeten Initiative #Logistikhilft. Erste Aktionen waren der Aufbau und Installation von zwei Sanitärcontainern für Lkw-FahrerInnen in Großbeeren (Brandenburg) sowie an der BAB A 8 im Großraum Stuttgart. Mit diesen Aktionen weist die Initiative auf die besonderen Herausforderungen im Kontext der Corona-Pandemie hin. Denn momentan sind viele Lkw-Fahrerinnen und Lkw-Fahrer, die ja aktuell auch Sonntags im Einsatz sind, in besonderem Maße auf einen lückenlosen Zugang zu sanitären Anlagen (Duschen und WCs) angewiesen. Dies gilt insbesondere an den Be- und Entladestellen, in Umschlaganlagen und Logistikzentren, an Parkplätzen, Autohöfen sowie Tank- und Rastanlagen.

title: Krone wins „Beste Logistikmarke Trailer und Aufbauten“
summary:
Krone can now call itself the „Beste Logistikmarke Trailer und Aufbauten“. This is the result of a large reader survey launched by the trade magazine "Logistik heute" and the Bundesvereinigung Logistik e.V. (BVL) in December 2019. A total of 26,567 votes were cast in the period from 13 December to 29 February 2020.

In total, more than 250 brands were put to the vote in twelve categories. The categories cover major areas of logistics, such as "vans and delivery vehicles", "trailers and bodies", "rail transport services", "IT for warehouse management", "contract logistics services" and "freight exchanges". The brands were nominated by an independent nomination committee headed by Prof Dr Christian Kille, logistics expert at Würzburg-Schweinfurt University of Applied Sciences. The nominees were brands that achieve the highest turnover in their category in Germany and are particularly relevant to the German market.

title: Eiskalter Sturm
summary: Um die Waren sicher und frisch zum Kunden bringen zu können, vertraut die Spedition Sturm auf die Cool Liner von Krone. Chassis, Aufbau und Ausstattung des Cool Liner sind stabil und durchdacht. Zudem wurden viele nützliche Details wie der flexible Luftkanal, die flüssigkeitsdichte Bodenwanne oder die hochwertigen Edelstahl-Heckverschlüsse gemeinsam mit Kunden entwickelt. Das Ergebnis: eine vielseitig einsetzbare und robuste Lösung für den Transport von Lebensmitteln und Pharmaprodukten.

title: Krone with own subsidiary in Sweden
summary: Close to the customer - Krone consistently lives this philosophy and has now integrated Krone Center Sverige AB into its own subsidiary in Sweden. The new subsidiary is located in Malmö, southern Sweden; Johan Carlstedt, who built up the company in 2014 and is responsible for the distribution of Krone vehicles in Sweden, remains the managing director.

title: Krone strengthens management team in Spain
summary: François Riveiro hired as the new managing director of Krone in Spain. With effect from February 6th, Riveiro took over the management of Krone Trailer España SLU (KTE) and Krone Fleet España SLU (KFE) and will first be responsible for the strategic reorientation of the two Krone companies.

title: Strategic move at Krone
summary: Bernard Krone, Managing Partner of the KRONE Holding SE & Co. KG, and Alfons Veer, chairman of the Krone Holding Executive Board, were elected members of the Krone Holding Supervisory Board in early January, with Bernard Krone taking the chair and Alfons Veer acting as his deputy.

title: Four new Krone liners for Schuon
summary: Kaizen - this is the motto of the Baden-Württemberg forwarding agency Schuon from Haiterbach. Kaizen comes from Japanese and stands for improvements for everyone, always and everywhere. In order to further improve its fleet, Schuon Logistik GmbH ordered two new Profi Liners and two new Dry Liners.

title: Less trips, more efficiency
summary: Alexander and Toni Hotz from Offenbach an der Queich recently received their second long HGV in Werlte. The forwarding agency Toni Hotz Transporte had already used a long HGV of the Giga Liner series in the past years and Alexander and Toni Hotz are enthusiastic about their first experiences.

title: Krone generates sales of 2.2 billion euros
summary: Against the backdrop of a sometimes difficult environment in the agricultural machinery and commercial trailer industries, the Krone Group finished the past 2018/2019 financial year (1 Aug 2018 – 31 Jul 2019) with a turnover of 2.24 billion euros, a result that marks another increase over the previous result (2.1 billion euros).

title: Silver Anniversary - 25 years Pozkrone
summary: For 25 years now, Pozkrone has been responsible for the general distribution of Krone vehicles in Poland. The Pozkrone success story began in 1994, when the company was founded under the management of Barbara Towpik-Roszkiewicz and Roman Roszkiewicz. Since then, the company has been successfully selling the entire Krone range of semi-trailers.

title: 45 Krone units for RTS Transport Service GmbH
summary: RTS Transport Service GmbH from Dassendorf has now invested in 45 new Krone units. For a symbolic handover of 40 turntable box carriers, two swap units and three central axle box carriers Mr. Jürgen Klein, managing director of RTS Transport Service GmbH, came to Werlte and took the opportunity of getting a detailed factory visit.

title: Smart Capacity Management Awarded
summary: For its innovative Smart Capacity Management, Krone was awarded the European Transport Prize for Sustainability in the Telematics category yesterday evening in Munich. The jury thus acknowledges the sustainable approach of this telematics solution, which enables intelligent networking with freight exchanges for efficient scheduling in freight traffic.

title: Würfel Logistik relies on Krone
summary: Quality, reliability, flexibility and cooperation based on partnership are the decisive criteria in the selection of swap bodies for the Bremerhaven logistics company Würfel Spedition GmbH.

title: Krone with vehicle variety at Solutrans
summary: At the Solutrans in Lyon Krone shows its product variety and exhibits a semi-trailer from the Profi Liner series, a Cool Liner, a container chassis Box Liner as well as the Profi Liner City.

title: Cool Liner now standard with Krone Telematics
summary: From now on Krone will equip all Cool Liner refrigerated vehicles as standard with Krone Telematics.

title: Krone celebrates 10th anniversary in Kazakhstan
summary: The team of Krone's subsidiary "Trailer Corporation Central Asia" celebrated the 10th anniversary of Krone's Kazakhstan office at a traditional Oktoberfest.

title: Better Painting AWARD goes to KRONE
summary: At the "Better Painting" congress, the Krone Commercial Vehicle Group was honoured for its new, innovative coating centre at the Werlte site.

title: Alfons Veer retires
summary: After 16 successful years, Alfons Veer (65) will resign from his position as Chairman of the Management Board of Bernard Krone Holding SE & Co KG at the end of the year due to his age and will join the Supervisory Board of the Krone Group on 1 January 2020.

title: Krone at the NUFAM 2019 in Karlsruhe
summary: At NUFAM 2019 Krone will be present with a show trailer; here interested visitors will be informed comprehensively about Krone vehicles and services.

title: Peter Ahlers new Managing Director of the Knapen-Group
summary: The Krone Commercial Vehicle Group has appointed Peter Ahlers (54) as Managing Director effective August 1, 2019. Ahlers will take over the management of the Knapen Group based in Deurne, the Netherlands, which has been part of the Krone Commercial Vehicle Group since July, and will report directly to the Management Board of Krone Holding. Peter Joosten, previous owner of the Knapen Group, will also remain Managing Director.

title: Krone Business Center in Haselünne officially opened
summary: "We are deliberately bundling synergies in the areas of accounting and IT so that we can continue to operate effectively and competitively with the Krone Group in Emsland" - with these words Bernard Krone officially opened the new Krone location in Haselünne, headquarters of the newly founded Krone Business Center GmbH & Co. KG, which operates 100 percent under the roof of Krone Holding.

title: Krone at Transport Compleet in Gorinchem
summary: From 3 to 5 September, the Transport Compleet trade fair in Gorinchem, South Holland, will once again be opening its doors from 2 p.m. to 10 p.m.. At the fair, Krone will present a Profi Liner with comprehensive load securing equipment and a container chassis from the eLTU70 series.

title: Fercam continues with Krone
summary: Innovative solutions, quality, intermodality and reliability are the decisive criteria in the selection of semi-trailers for the Italian logistics company Fercam. As Johann Friedrich Harder, head of Fercam's Bolzano branch and responsible for the company's fleet, points out on the occasion of the latest delivery of 80 Krone Profi Liners with special equipment for railway transport, Krone meets the high demands the company places on its equipment.

title: Krone at Nürburgring Truck Grand Prix
summary: The Truck Grand Prix at the Nürburgring is the driver's event of the year every year - and of course the Krone Drivers Club will be exhibiting again this year.

title: 10 years partner: Torello and Krone celebrate
summary: The Italian logistics service provider Torello and Fahrzeugwerk Krone - together with the Italian Krone importer Real Trailer - recently celebrated 10 years of cooperation between the two companies at the Krone site in Lübtheen. In keeping with the occasion, 50 new Cool Liners were officially handed over.

title: Best Curtainsider! - Best Brand 2019
summary: Krone products placed three times on the podium in the reader survey "Best Brands 2019". Krone took the first place in the "curtainsider" category; in the previous year, Krone was still in second place here.

title: Knapen and Krone join forces
summary:
Krone Commercial Vehicle
Group (incl. its subsidiaries) has signed the takeover of 100% of
the shares of the Dutch Knapen Group (incl. its subsidiaries
Knapen Trailers BV, Knapen Service BV and Trailned BV).

title: Krone Profi Liner wins "Top Trailer Slovakia 2019"
summary: The Krone Profi Liner has now been awarded the title "Top Trailer Slovakia 2019". More than 1000 votes from the Slovakian transport industry were cast in the category of trailers; the Krone Profi Liner was awarded first place in this category.

title: Mega Liner with job offer
summary: Are you a Peiffer guy? This question is written in huge white letters at the rear of five new Mega Liners, which Axel Peiffer, owner of the forwarding agency of the same name, has now picked up in Werlte. Eight Peiffer employees are laughing at the curtains on the trailers. Above them is the message: We are guys. Become a road star. Peiffer-Typen.de.

title: Transport Logistic 2019 Special
summary: All highlights at a glance.

title: Krone wins Green Truck Trailer Innovation Award
summary: Yesterday evening, Krone received the Green Truck Trailer Innovation Award for Smart Capacity Management. The jury thus praised the sustainable increase in transport efficiency made possible by the use of Smart Capacity Management. Dr. Frank Albers, Managing Director Sales & Marketing, accepted the award on behalf of the entire Krone team.

title: KRONE at transport logistic Munich
summary: Krone is exhibiting a range of vehicles at transport logistic: The Cool Liner, which is equipped with the new Celsineo cooling system, a joint development by Liebherr and Krone, is expected to be of great interest. Krone will also be showing a Profi Liner with Safe Curtain load securing curtain, in which high-strength spring steel strips are installed in the side curtain, as well as a Mega Liner in the Comfort version; thanks to the innovative side curtains, drivers can open the vehicle in less than 30 seconds, which significantly shortens the entire loading process.

title: CELSINEO - new technology for refrigerated transport
summary: Krone and Liebherr have entered into a partnership for the development, sales and servicing of refrigeration units. Both companies have signed the relevant cooperation agreement.

title: Box Liner and Profi Liner at the Transport Compleet
summary: From 26 to 28 March 2019, the Transport Compleet trade fair will open its doors from 2 p.m. to 10 p.m. In Hardenberg, the Netherlands, Krone presents two all-round vehicles: a curtainsider from the Profi Liner series and the universal container chassis Box Liner eLTU70.

title: Krone wins Image Award
summary: 1st place in the trailer category - this great result for Krone was announced during the official presentation of the Image Award 2019 in Munich. Bernard Krone received the award on behalf of the entire Krone team. In addition, Krone achieved second place in the superstructure category.

title: 10.000 Euro for the Uwe Seeler Foundation
summary: Dr. Bernard Krone and Bernard Krone yesterday presented Uwe Seeler with a cheque for 10,000 euros for the Uwe Seeler Foundation. The former captain and honorary captain of the German national football team thanked for the donation and explained that the money will be used to support people who are dependent on the help of others because of their physical, mental or spiritual condition. "Those who owe so much to sport and are on the sunny side of life should give something to those who never had the chance to feel such happiness and are on the shady side of life," says Uwe Seeler.

title: Ansgar Jansen: New sales manager at Krone
summary: On January 1, Ansgar Jansen (45) took over the sales management of the Krone Commercial Vehicle Group for Germany, Austria and Switzerland. The graduate engineer has more than two decades of sales know-how; in a mechanical engineering company in Lower Saxony, he first gained experience as regional sales manager in Germany and abroad before being appointed export sales manager in 2011.

title: Krone doubles its production capacity in Herzlake
summary: Due to the very positive market demand for interchangeable systems and Dry Liners, Krone will significantly increase production capacity at its Herzlake site.

title: Krone finishes again with record sales
summary: Against the backdrop of a sometimes difficult environment in the agricultural machinery and commercial trailer industries, the Krone Group finished the past 2017/2018 financial year (1 Aug 2017 – 31 Jul 2018) with another record turnover of about 2.1 billion euros which marks a significant increase over the previous result (1.9 billion euros).

title: LTG buys first truck trailer at auction
summary: The Langenlonsheimer Transport GmbH (LTG) auctioned off a KRONE Profi Liner in the new Brummi Edition with the highest bid of 26,500 euros. The proceeds from the auction serve as founding capital for the joint initiative of the Bundesverband Güterkraftverkehr Logistik und Entsorgung (BGL) and Krone to strengthen the image of the professional driver in public opinion.

title: Krone vehicles for improved city and port logistics
summary: The German commercial vehicle manufacturer Krone is exhibiting at the Transport Compleet trade fair. This international trade fair will take place from September 4 to 6 2018 in Gorinchem in the Netherlands. Krone will showcase the Profi Liner City, a flatbed semitrailer for city-friendly transport. It is equipped with forced steering, which makes it exceptionally manoeuvrable when making deliveries in tight areas. The Profi Liner City transports building materials, furniture, and electronics, to name a few.

title: IAA 2018 Special
summary: Clever Connections - KRONE presents practical vehicles and customised 360° services

title: KRONE officially inaugurates new coating centre
summary: As part of the "Krone Future Lab", Bernard Krone and Federal Minister of Transport Andreas Scheuer officially opened the new Krone Coating Centre (OFZ) at the Werlte site in front of around 400 invited guests.

title: Clever Connections - IAA 2018
summary: Cleverly connecting the transport world and creating first-class added value - that is what this year's Krone motto "Clever Connections" for the IAA Commercial Vehicles stands for.

title: Alfons B. Veer switches to Commercial Vehicles
summary: As of 1 August 2018, Alfons B. Veer, CEO of Trenkamp & Gehle GmbH, will also be appointed Executive Director at the Krone Commercial Vehicles Group.

title: 1,000 trailers delivered to N&K Spedition in Esbjerg
summary:
N&K Spedition is one of Krone's largest refrigeration customers and has just received its 1,000th refrigerated semitrailer from Krone Fleet Denmark since 2010. 
N&K’s fleet of semitrailers is equipped with Krone Telematics, which enables all data to be scanned into N&K's internal IT system. N&K has currently commissioned 225 new refrigerated semitrailers for delivery during 2018/2019. The last order includes several refrigerated vehicles with meat-hanging rails, piggyback trailers, and single-temp’ trailers.

title: Changes to the senior management at Krone CV Group
summary: Dr Frank Albers takes over as Managing Director of National/Internationals Sales and Marketing at the Krone Commercial Vehicle Group

title: Krone joins ADAC Truck Grand Prix at Nürburgring
summary: Once again this year, Krone is an official sponsor of the FIA European Truck Racing Championship (FIA ETRC) and is participating as an exhibitor at the Truck Grand Prix, which is taking place at the Nürburgring in the Eifel for the 33rd time.

title: Easy, quick, safe: Spring steel instead of plug-in lathes
summary: The load securing curtain - Krone Safe Curtain - The name says it all: With Krone's load securing curtain Safe Curtain, high-strength spring steel strips are integrated in vertical PVC tunnel pockets in the side curtains.

title: KRONE presents unique load-securing systems
summary:
KRONE is exhibiting a Profi Liner curtainsider trailer at the Brussels commercial transport show, ‘We are Transport’, which features the market-proven Multi-Lock and Multi-Block load securing systems.
Used throughout Europe and known for its flexibility and safety, the Profi Liner comes with the Multi lock system as standard, with each side rave having up to 130 lashing points and a load capacity of 2,000 tonnes per loading point.

title: Schmid Transport celebrates 70th anniversary with Krone
summary: The Regensburg-based transport and freight-forwarder, Schmid Transport and Spedition GmbH & Co, has taken delivery of 33 new Box Liner container carriers from Krone for its national and international logistics operation.

title: Krone Parts get there faster with Unique QR Code
Krone honours stem cell donors
summary: 621 Krone employees signed up as potential stem cell donors during the blood typing campaigns in Werlte (2007) and Spelle (2014). No fewer than 23 Krone employees have since donated stem cells, most having registered during the two company campaigns, some as a result of other public recruitment drives.

title: Central spare parts centre for improved customer service
summary:
In response to current and future demand for parts requirements in the commercial vehicle sector, Krone Commercial Vehicle Group has started operations at its new central logistics centre. 

With an investment approaching 8.5 million Euros, the ground-breaking distribution centre was built at Europastraße 233 (main road 213) in Herzlake within a total area of 38,000 square metres. This is equal to five and a half football fields.

title: Two Hundred and Fifty Vehicles Roll with Heavy Goods
summary: As Regional Sales Manager in his area, Markus Gemmel supervises the federal states of Rhineland-Palatinate and Saarland. His customer, L.T.G., is a Langenlonsheim-based company that specialises in heavy goods.

title: Krone-Holding expands senior management team
summary:
Bernard Krone Holding SE & Co. KG is expanding its senior management team. Dr David Frink (45) will join chairman of the board Alfons Veer (63) and managing partner Bernard Krone as CFO (Chief Financial Officer) of the Krone Group. From 1 April 2018, Dr Frink will take responsibility for strategic and conception-al development and operational areas (finance and accounting, controlling, taxation, M&A, IT and process control, legal affairs and human resources).
By expanding the top management base, Krone is adapting to the challenges facing the Agricultural Machinery and Commercial Ve-hicles divisions, especially in view of the company's expansion and increasing internationalisation.

title: Krone maintains its strong market position
summary: Bucking the trend – this is an appropriate way to describe the growth of the Krone Group over the past few financial years. While many agricultural machinery manufacturers have had to cope with a severe downturn in sales, even in this financial year Krone succeeded in generating a record turnover.

title: Cargo bike concept wins European Transport Prize
summary: The newly founded joint venture RYTLE of the Krone Group and Orbitak AG was awarded the European Transport Prize for Sustainability 2018 by an expert jury for its innovative cargo bike concept. In the category "Mobility concepts", the young company affirmed itself against renowned industry experts.

title: Well-attended Solutrans trade fair in Lyon
KRONE at the French Solutrans 2017 Trade Fair in Lyon
summary: Commercial vehicle manufacturer Krone is participating in the Solutrans trade fair (Salon International des Solutions de Transport Routier et Urbain) in Lyon from November 21 to 25 2017. Krone will showcase the Dry Liner dry freight box body, the Cool Liner refrigerated semitrailer, the City Liner flatbed semitrailer along with Mega Liner Multos and telematics.

title: KRONE Winner of the German Telematics Award 2018
summary: Krone wins the “German Telematics Award 2018” for its innovative trailer telematics that meet the wide ranging demands of the logistic specialists of today and tomorrow. The ETM publishing house awards this important and coveted industry prize during the Future Congress Commercial Vehicles.

title: Opening of the Krone France SAS Center
summary: Together with approximately 250 guests from the French logistics industry, the Krone France Team opened the new Krone Center in Lyon, near the Saint Exupéry Airport (a 5 min. drive).

title: High demand for professional transport solutions
summary: At the COMTRANS 2017 commercial vehicle trade fair in Moscow, KRONE presented trailers and services "Made in Germany" to the Russian transport and logistics market.

title: KRONE at Moscow's Comtrans 2017 Trade Fair
summary: From the 4th to the 9th of September 2017, Krone will be presenting its practical transport solutions in hall 13, stand 13-360 at Comtrans 2017 in Moscow.

title: Krone makes strategic appointment
summary: As part of the realignment of sales activities in Key Account Management, Ingo Geerdes has been appointed Managing Director of Fahrzeugwerk Bernard Krone GmbH & Co. KG. In this role, the 48-year-old will responsible for both national and international areas of Key Account Management as well as all Krone Fleet activities and the Krone Used Organisation.

title: PEMA expands fleet with commercial vehicles from Krone
summary: At the transport logistic fair in Munich, Krone Commercial Vehicle Group and PEMA GmbH agreed on the delivery of a mixture of trailer units.

title: 2.300 Krone swap bodies sold to Seaco Global
summary: Hermes Germany modernizes infrastructure with high-strength Krone swap bodies

title: Transway Parts keep Krone trailers on the move in Ireland
summary: Transway Parts, the aftermarket and support service division of Fleet Solutions is now providing same-day delivery of all fast-moving Krone parts to Dublin and overnight parts delivery nationwide.

title: Krone twice awarded “Best Brand 2017”
summary: Krone has been named a winner in the category “curtainsided and refrigerated semitrailers” and ranks second best in the category “trailer axles” of the “Best Brands 2017”.

title: Krone and Trailer Partner win readers’ award TOP SLOVAKIA
summary: The journal “Transport a Logistika” awarded the Slovakian KRONE retailer Trailer Partner. Trailer Partner is winner of the renowned prize TOP SLOVAKIA 2017.

title: Krone offers compliant Box Liners with maximized payload
summary: Compact rear end improves payload for 20 ft. containers - Universal box container eLTU70 adapts to most forms of transport transports

title: 500th KRONE trailer handed over to Blue Water Group
summary: KRONE Fleet Danmark A/S has recently delivered 134 Profi Liners to Blue Water Shipping. With this latest delivery, the trailer fleet of the Danish transport and logistics specialist has grown to 500 Krone units.

title: Krone wins BVL-Award “Best Logistic Brand 2017“
summary: As a manufacturer of trailers and superstructures, Krone wins the prize “Best Logistic Brand 2017“ awarded by the Federal Association of Logistics (Bundesvereinigung Logistik, BVL).

title: Krone supplies Benway Marine & Logistics
summary: The Krone Commercial Vehicles Group has delivered ten semitrailers from the Dry Liner dry case model series to Benway Marine & Logistics GmbH & Co. KG. The purchase of ten dry case models from Werlte helps the Benway fleet from Papenburg to continue on the road to success.

title: Future-oriented generation change
summary: Gábor Somogyi, 38, is the new managing director of Hungarian Krone Trailer SE Kft. Somogyi follows directly in the footsteps of Hannes Nachtelberger, who retired recently.

title: Hannes Nachtelberger retires
summary: Hannes Nachtelberger, 63, managing director of Krone Trailer SE Kft. in Budapest and Sales Director for Krone Austria, commenced his well-earned retirement at the end of January.

title: Krone builds new spare parts warehouse
summary: The Krone Commercial Vehicle Group is building a 8,500 square metre warehouse near European Route 233 in Herzlake to store replacement parts for all vehicles distributed by the Krone Commercial Vehicle Group.

title: 80 semitrailers for CTJ Janssen
summary: 80 new Krone semitrailers from the Profi Liner model series are now being deployed at CTJ Janssen GmbH. The trailers were officially handed over to Ernst-August Bührke (head of the technical department) at the Werlte Krone location by Krone's Managing Director Gero Schulze Isfort, Sales Manager Dr. Frank Albers and Regional Sales Manager Claus-Peter Hütten.

title: Commercial vehicle industry under economic pressure
summary: Due to massive increases in raw material and energy prices, moderate price adjustments are unavoidable.

title: Krone Group stays on good course
summary: Although markets remained difficult, the Krone Group generated sales of around 1.8 billion euros in the fiscal year 2015/2016, a result that once again exceeds the previous year’s result (1.6 billion euros).

title: Krone invests in Werlte site
summary: The Krone Commercial Vehicle Group plans to construct an ultra-modern coating plant in Werlte. Krone intends to construct the factory, with a footprint of around 16,000 m2, at the site in Bernard-Krone-Straße.

title: DFDS 'Pink Trailer' campaign to 'drive out breast cancer'
summary: International freight forwarder and multi-modal specialist DFDS has selected a Krone trailer from its European fleet to play centre stage in a new initiative supporting breast cancer awareness.

title: GBA Services returns to Krone for ‘trouble-free’ service
summary: Lancashire - based operator GBA Services has added a further 22 Krone trailers to its fleet as demand for the company’s services in the pharmaceutical and high-value, time-critical logistics sectors continues to expand.

title: Krone Center opens in Rotterdam
summary: Together with some 150 guests, the Krone Trailer BV team celebrated the opening of the new Krone Center in Rotterdam. In his welcome speech, Dr Bernard Krone highlighted the fact that Krone would continue to consistently pursue the strategy of being "close to the customer".

title: Efficiency Run 2016
summary: Up to 20 percent less fuel and CO2: Mercedes-Benz Trucks and Krone present highly efficient semitrailer-tractor combination

title: 500th Krone box trailer for Dachser France
summary: The overall 500th Krone box trailer was recently officially handed over by Ingo Geerdes, Krone Director Key Account Management, to Frédéric Jurado and Philippe Ricard from Dachser France.

title: Warrens take first consignment of Code XL Dry Liners from Krone
summary: Warrens Warehousing Group has taken delivery of its first consignment of Dry Liner box trailers from Krone which, says the company, will join its 200-strong European trailer fleet and carry bread and cake products for a number of leading supermarkets.

title: Krone at Comvex in Istanbul
summary: The specialist trade fair, Comvex, is taking place from 21st to 24th May in Istanbul. Krone has a 1,200 sqm stand at the exhibition and will exhibit vehicles which are particularly relevant to the Turkish market and the markets of Turkey's neighbouring countries.

title: The new Krone Center in Gebze has opened
summary: Strategic development of Turkish activities - The new Krone Center in Gebze (near Istanbul) has now been officially opened.

title: Gustke Food Logistik relies on Krone
summary: Two, visually striking Krone Cool Liner trailers have recently been received by Stephan Gustke, Managing Director of Spedition Heinrich Gustke GmbH, who are based in Lübtheen, Germany.

title: Krone Trailers for Tarrant International
summary: Tarrant International Transport, one of Ireland’s leading logistics and distribution operators has added four new Krone Profi Liners to its fleet and says that the curtainsiders break new ground in terms of loading flexibility.

title: Lower Saxony Foreign Trade Prize has been awarded
summary: Krone honoured for successful development in Turkey - For the successful development of Fahrzeugwerk Krone and in relation to the Turkish production site, Krone TİCARİ ARAÇLAR SAN.VE TİC.A.Ş (KTA), Krone's Managing Director Riza Akgün accepted a prize from the Lower Saxony Ministry of Economics at the Hanover Fair.

title: Robust and functional - Krone's new building materials trailer
summary: With its newly designed building material trailer – Load Carrier – Krone offers a robust and practically-oriented vehicle which has been specially tailored to meet the specific requirements of building materials transportation.

title: 400th Krone Trailer for freight forwarding company Peiffer
summary: Freight forwarding company Peiffer and Fahrzeugwerk Krone are celebrating two significant anniversaries: For 40 years Peiffer has been a customer of Krone and recently picked up their 400th Krone vehicle, a Profi Liner.

title: Bring concludes framework agreement with Krone for curtainsider trailers
summary: An agreement between Krone and the Norwegian logistics operator Bring has recently been signed by Equipment Director Jan Anderson for the supply of curtainsider trailers over the next three years.

title: Trailer marriage in Emsland: Krone and Brüggen merge to become KRONE Commercial Vehicle SE
summary: Krone repositions itself in the utility vehicle business - The long-standing collaboration between Fahrzeugwerk Bernard Krone GmbH and Brüggen Fahrzeugwerk & Service GmbH is about to become even closer.

title: The future in focus
summary: Krone maintains sales revenue at 1.6 billion euros - Despite difficult market conditions, including the impact of the Russian crisis and the expiration of EU milk production quotas, the Krone Group generated sales of about 1.6 billion euros in the fiscal year 2014/2015 - a result that is slightly higher than the previous year.
